title: Exchange Rates Pro - Real-time Currency Converter
description: Convert between 100+ currencies with real-time exchange rates. Compare providers, see API support, and choose the best rate source.

hero.title: Real-Time Currency Converter
hero.subtitle: Convert between 100+ currencies with transparent exchange rates

apis.title: Available Exchange Rate APIs
apis.subtitle: Compare which APIs support your currencies and see their real-time exchange rates.

sources.title: Currency Data Sources
sources.subtitle: We aggregate exchange rates from multiple trusted sources to provide accurate and up-to-date currency conversions.

dataAccuracy.title: Data Accuracy & Updates
dataAccuracy.description1: All exchange rates are fetched in real-time from their respective sources. Update frequencies vary by provider, from real-time updates to daily snapshots. We use intelligent caching to ensure fast response times while maintaining data freshness.
dataAccuracy.description2: For critical financial transactions, we recommend verifying rates with your financial institution. The rates displayed are mid-market rates and may not reflect the exact rate you'll receive for currency exchanges.

providers.title: Compare Exchange Rate Providers
providers.subtitle: See which providers support your currencies and compare their rates.
providers.currencyLimit: You can select up to 5 currencies with the free plan. Upgrade to premium for unlimited currencies.
providers.selectCurrenciesToCompare: Select currencies from the table below to compare exchange rates across providers
providers.clickRowToSelect: Click on any currency row to add or remove it from your selection

descriptions.exchangerate-api: A reliable and easy-to-use exchange rate API with excellent uptime and coverage of over 160 currencies.
descriptions.openexchangerates: Trusted by thousands of developers, providing exchange rates for over 200 currencies with historical data.
descriptions.fixer: Real-time exchange rate data for 170 world currencies, with data updates every 60 seconds.
descriptions.ecb: Official reference rates published by the European Central Bank for major world currencies.
descriptions.cbr: Official exchange rates set by the Central Bank of the Russian Federation.
descriptions.nbu: Official exchange rates provided by the National Bank of Ukraine.
descriptions.nbp: Exchange rates published by Narodowy Bank Polski (National Bank of Poland).
descriptions.nbrb: Official exchange rates from the National Bank of the Republic of Belarus.
descriptions.nbg: Exchange rates provided by the National Bank of Georgia.
descriptions.tradermade: Professional-grade forex data with real-time updates and extensive currency pair coverage.
descriptions.forex: Real-time foreign exchange rates with low latency and high reliability.

triangulation.title: Triangulation Transparency
triangulation.description: See how rates are calculated through intermediate currencies
triangulation.explanation: Sometimes converting through an intermediate currency can provide better rates

settings.title: Settings
settings.info: Your preferences are saved locally and will be remembered on your next visit.
settings.currencyLimitReached: You have reached the limit of 5 currencies. Upgrade to premium for unlimited currency selection.

about.pageTitle: Currency Converter PRO - Real-Time Exchange Rates at Your Fingertips
about.pageDescription: Transform the way you work with currencies. Our powerful Chrome extension delivers instant, accurate exchange rates from 12+ trusted sources worldwide, ensuring you always get the best rate for your money.

hero.title: Currency Converter PRO
hero.subtitle: The Smart Choice for Currency Conversion
hero.tagline: Transform the way you work with currencies. Our powerful Chrome extension delivers instant, accurate exchange rates from 12+ trusted sources worldwide, ensuring you always get the best rate for your money.

mission.title: Why Professionals Choose Currency Converter PRO
mission.description: Stop guessing. Start knowing. Join thousands of smart users who make data-driven decisions with professional-grade currency data.

whyUs.title: Why Professionals Choose Currency Converter PRO

transparency.title: Unmatched Accuracy
transparency.description: Access real-time rates from the world's most reliable sources including European Central Bank, national banks, and leading financial data providers. Our intelligent system automatically selects the freshest data.

realTime.title: Lightning-Fast Performance
realTime.description: Convert currencies instantly as you type. No waiting, no loading screens - just immediate results when you need them. Perfect for fast-paced trading environments and time-sensitive decisions.

trusted.title: Complete Global Coverage
trusted.description: 170+ currencies including all major pairs, cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Ethereum), regional currencies from emerging markets, and precious metals (Gold XAU, Silver XAG).

features.title: Features That Save You Time and Money

multipleDataSources.title: Multiple Data Sources = Better Rates
multipleDataSources.description: Unlike basic converters that rely on a single source, we aggregate data from 12 premium providers. Compare rates across sources, choose the best rate for your transaction, and avoid hidden margins.

smartConversion.title: Smart Conversion Features
smartConversion.description: Auto-detect amounts on any webpage - just highlight and convert. Reverse calculations with one click. Multi-currency support for any pair. Offline mode with cached rates.

professionalTools.title: Professional Tools
professionalTools.description: Historical data to see rate changes over time. Percentage change indicators to spot trends. Favorite pairs for quick access. Decimal precision control from 2 to 10 places.

instantConversion.title: Instant Conversion
instantConversion.description: Convert currencies with one click directly from your browser toolbar. Support for 150+ currencies worldwide.

rateComparison.title: Rate Comparison
rateComparison.description: Compare rates from multiple providers instantly. See which bank or service offers the best exchange rate for your needs.

historicalCharts.title: Historical Charts
historicalCharts.description: View 30-day rate trends to make informed decisions about when to exchange your money.

smartAlerts.title: Smart Alerts
smartAlerts.description: Set rate alerts and get notified when your target exchange rate is reached.

offlineMode.title: Offline Mode
offlineMode.description: Access cached rates even when offline. Perfect for travelers without constant internet access.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy & Security First
privacyFirst.description: Your data stays yours. No account required, no tracking or analytics, no personal data collection. All conversions happen locally on your device.

customizable.title: Customizable Experience
customizable.description: Choose your preferred data source, set default currencies, adjust update frequency, and switch between light and dark themes. Clean, intuitive interface with no clutter or ads.

business.title: For Business Professionals
business.description: Make informed decisions with institutional-grade exchange rates. Perfect for international invoicing and payments, financial reporting and accounting, e-commerce pricing strategies, and import/export calculations.

travelers.title: For Travelers
travelers.description: Plan budgets with confidence, compare prices while shopping online, track spending in multiple currencies, and avoid surprises at currency exchange counters.

investors.title: For Investors & Traders
investors.description: Monitor forex markets throughout the day, track cryptocurrency valuations, spot arbitrage opportunities, and make data-driven investment decisions.

step1.title: Install the Extension
step1.description: Add Exchange Rates Pro to Chrome with one click. No registration required.

step2.title: Select Your Currencies
step2.description: Choose from 150+ currencies. The extension remembers your preferences.

step3.title: Compare Rates Instantly
step3.description: See real-time rates from multiple providers. Pick the best rate for your conversion.

step4.title: Make Informed Decisions
step4.description: Use historical charts and rate alerts to time your conversions perfectly.

dataSources.title: Our Trusted Data Sources
dataSources.description: We aggregate exchange rates from the most reliable sources in the industry:

q1.question: What makes Exchange Rates Pro different?
q1.answer: Unlike other converters that show rates from a single source, we aggregate data from 12+ trusted providers, allowing you to compare and choose the best rate. This transparency can save you significant money on large conversions.

q2.question: Is the Chrome extension really free?
q2.answer: Yes, Exchange Rates Pro is 100% free with no hidden costs, premium tiers, or subscription fees. We believe everyone deserves access to transparent exchange rates.

q3.question: How accurate are the exchange rates?
q3.answer: Our rates come directly from central banks, major financial institutions, and established forex providers. Most sources update every 60 seconds to 10 minutes, ensuring you always have current market rates.

q4.question: Does the extension track my data?
q4.answer: No. We respect your privacy completely. The extension works entirely on your device, stores preferences locally, and never sends your conversion history or personal data to any servers.

q5.question: Can I use it offline?
q5.answer: Yes! The extension caches the latest rates, so you can continue converting currencies even without an internet connection. Perfect for international travelers.

cta.title: Ready to Save on Currency Conversion?
cta.subtitle: Whether you're managing international business, planning your next trip, or tracking investments, Currency Converter PRO gives you the edge with accurate, real-time data from sources you can trust.
cta.tagline: Free to use. No registration. No hidden costs. Just better currency conversion.
